game.name: stardust
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: stardust lets you travel through space, collect colorful sparkles and paint the canvas that is the universe with your trails of stellar dust.
